metadata.name: I Love You
metadata.description:
A Valentines Day Drop: 
The Gift That Doesn't Melt or Wilter Away

The digital evolution of contemporary artist WhIsBe’s 2017 traditional neon work ‘I FUCKING LOVE FUCKING YOU.’ Originally released as a 30 x 40” glass neon sculptural work, the piece explores the duality of phrasing. The piece has been exhibited in numerous collections, several hospitality venues and as a large scale 25' installation at Burning Man.

We hope you enjoy this Multiphase release.

Phase One: 24 Hour Open Edition Release

Phase Two: The top 69 holders of the 'I Love You' OE will receive one limited edition 69 pre-inscribed ordinals, created specifically for the Bitcoin blockchain. Snapshot will be taken 72 hours after mint close.

Phase Three: Burn. Details TBA.

Twitter: @WhIsBeArt & @WhIsBeVandalz  
Instagram: @WhIsBe & @WhIsBeVandalz  
Website: https://whisbeverse.wtf/
